blog.name: westerosiladies
blog.title: GoT Ladies
blog.description: A blog dedicated to the badass ladies of Westeros (There will probably be some stuff on the guys too, but mostly ladies)

tags: anyway i mentioned her age because there's too many things happening in the next two books for an 11-12 year old to get into a romance. none
it's full on aegon vs daenerys and then euron vs daenerys/bran
then everyone vs the night king
my point was gendry/sansa is so nonsensical that it makes arya/gendry likely
summary: No, when arya met him she was 10, not 9! And she thinks he is about robb’s age, but he can’t be, because he was convinced after...
question: No, when arya met him she was 10, not 9! And she thinks he is about robb’s age, but he can’t be, because he was convinced after Roberts rebellion!
answer:
*Conceived, not convinced

And also if he was 17 brienne wouldn’t call him “a boy”! Renly was “a man grown“ and he was 16, when she first met him!

Arya never said that he was 15, she said that he is 5 years older than her “Gendry was five years older and a foot taller than she was“ -acok (which he can’t be because he was conceived after Roberts rebellion (Robert was for a year fighting rheagar in the battle of the trident and then he was heavily injured)) That makes him 3-4 years older than her… not 6! (Sorry for so many messages)

Robert’s Rebellion ended in 283. Gendry was born in 284. Arya was born in 289. As for his age, when Eddard Stark saw him he compared him to Robb (AGoT “The master called over a tall lad about Robb’s age, his arms and chest corded with muscle.”). It is possible that because of poverty he looks older than his actual age but again Arya says he is 5 years older which is a specific number.(ACoK “Arya had to scamper to keep up. Gendry was five years older and a foot taller than she was, and long of leg as well.”). She could have said ‘he was years older’ if it was 3-4 years instead.

title: Watching Arya
body:
Pairing : Jaqen H’ghar/ Arya Stark

Disclaimer : I own nothing.

Warning : Language, one word really. Some nudity. It’s pretty much fluff tho :)

Summary : Modern AU. Jaqen has been sent to Westeros to watch over Arya. Arya is 18, Jaqen is 26.

The window opened and he saw her, looking lovelier than ever and… wearing nothing at all.

Jaqen averted his eyes.

Don’t expose yourself like that, sweet girl. Not to this wicked world. Not to me.

Staring at the empty wall in his own apartment didn’t help. He closed his eyes but the image of Arya Stark standing naked in a pool of morning sunlight wouldn’t vanish. Everything was lovely about her. Her budding breasts and berry lips, her big grey eyes, her messy, chestnut hair. The way she lifted one foot and scratched the other. Even the way she yawned.

He had to remind himself he was there to watch over her not to stare at her. Watch and intervene, discreetly, if any of her enemies were there to get her or if someone were to find out who she really was. She wasn’t ready to face them all by herself. Not yet.

Just focus and keep her safe !

In another world where she wasn’t the missing daughter of the late senator Stark and he wasn’t who he was…In another world he could ask her out, find some nice place. Some vintage cafe, he mused, that would be to her liking. With roses and trees growing outside. By the river, she would love the river ! He could be holding those lovely hands and taste her berry lips.

He dared to look again.

To his relief the girl disappeared in her room.

She emerged from the building half an hour later. She overslept. She’s going to be late to work again. Good old Walda at Bolton & Son would lie to her husband about it so he wouldn’t fire the girl. Jaqen made sure Walda was Arya’s friend. She was a nice lady, he wondered why she chose to marry that dreadful man.

As usual Arya stopped by the bench under the maple tree where a certain fluffy red cat was waiting for her. She sat crossed legged on the bench and the cat slowly approached, crouching inches from her.

Don’t play hard to get ! Jaqen grinned. She already knows you come here for her !

When he first saw it, the kitten was a small miserable waif. He watched Arya struggling to take it home day after day but the little rebel wasn’t the one to be tamed. When autumn came and the days grew colder Jaqen tried his luck and to his surprise the cat followed him to his place. It amused him how quickly the waif turned into a spoiled little beast. A shameless bed stealer and a picky eater who never touched cat food unless it was Arya feeding it. But even though the cat was apparently happy, ruling its new kingdom, Jaqen had to let it out every morning and that moody little thing would wait around patiently until Arya Stark appeared.

The girl kissed the cat’s head, laughing when it tried to claw at her.

Jaqen chuckled.

Come on, little buddy, admit you love her, don’t fight it !

She opened a can of cheap cat food and offered it to her companion. Jaqen pouted when the gift was eagerly accepted. The cat is greedy. He had already shared his breakfast with their friend. A royal breakfast, salmon and scrambled eggs. It would be the fattest cat in the neighborhood if they kept feeding it like that. But she looked so happy ! The little foodie was her only friend.

Arya ran her small hand over the cat’s red fur and Jaqen wondered what it felt like to be touched by her.

Fuck. He had to cut that shit. They didn’t send him to Westeros to fall in love with her.

Just try to keep her safe.

Pairing : Jaqen H’ghar/ Arya Stark

Disclaimer : I own nothing.

Warning : Language, one word really. Some nudity. It’s pretty much fluff tho :)

Summary : Modern AU. Jaqen has been sent to Westeros to watch over Arya. Arya is 18, Jaqen is 26.

The window opened and he saw her, looking lovelier than ever and… wearing nothing at all.

Jaqen averted his eyes.

Don’t expose yourself like that, sweet girl. Not to this wicked world. Not to me.

blog.name: gendrie
blog.title: fierce and terrible and hers
blog.description:
annalesa / 27 / pisces /
they would not make her yield

tags: i just want someone to hold her and tell her it wasnt her fault and that shes good
this is a huge factor in the whole arya and love thing
arya doesnt think she deserves love
summary: i was thinking about how frequently - within the text - the word “innocence” is associated with sansa but literally never with...
body: i was thinking about how frequently - within the text - the word “innocence” is associated with sansa but literally never with arya. i thought it was interesting. because arya was innocent too so what gives? but then i realized arya never perceived herself as such. not even in the beginning. innocent means not guilty of any wrongdoing and before the story opens arya already has been made to feel shes done everything wrong. and its a consistent theme for her. even after the trident and the march to harrenhal arya hates “herself most of all” and feels guilty. she never sees herself as a victim. she’s always culpable. and a lot of that stems from the fact that she’s unable to perform the role society forces on women. she’s “bad” “wicked” “ugly” everything bad is her fault and she doesnt deserve……anything good. its why she fears her family won’t want her back. which only gets worse throughout her story as she’s forced to do even more dark and harsh things to survive.

blog.name: gendrie
blog.title: fierce and terrible and hers
blog.description:
annalesa / 27 / pisces /
they would not make her yield

tags: arya ii last night killed me
summary: One day she came back grinning her horsey grin, her hair all tangled and her clothes covered in mud, clutching a raggedy bunch...
body:
One day she came back grinning her horsey grin, her hair all tangled and her clothes covered in mud, clutching a raggedy bunch of purple and green flowers for Father. Sansa kept hoping he would tell Arya to behave herself and act like the highborn lady she was supposed to be, but he never did, he only hugged her and thanked her for the flowers.  

Ned went to one knee and took her in his arms. She was shaking. “I’m sorry,” she sobbed, “I’m sorry, I’m sorry.”
“I know,” he said. She felt so tiny in his arms, nothing but a scrawny little girl.

She turned away, shaking. “I asked him,” she cried. “It was my fault, it was me …”Suddenly her father’s arms were around her. He held her gently as she turned to him and sobbed against his chest. “No, sweet one,” he murmured. “Grieve for your friend, but never blame yourself.

Arya cocked her head to one side. "Can I be a king’s councillor and build castles and become the High Septon?”
“You,” Ned said, kissing her lightly on the brow, “will marry a king and rule his castle, and your sons will be knights and princes and lords and, yes, perhaps even a High Septon.”

*He kissed her on the brow. “We’ll finish our talk on the morrow.”

ned was so affectionate with arya and im gonna cry because she needs a hug so bad

Ned went to one knee and took her in his arms. She was shaking. “I’m sorry,” she sobbed, “I’m sorry, I’m sorry.”
“I know,” he said. She felt so tiny in his arms, nothing but a scrawny little girl.

She turned away, shaking. “I asked him,” she cried. “It was my fault, it was me …”Suddenly her father’s arms were around her. He held her gently as she turned to him and sobbed against his chest. “No, sweet one,” he murmured. “Grieve for your friend, but never blame yourself.

Arya cocked her head to one side. "Can I be a king’s councillor and build castles and become the High Septon?”
“You,” Ned said, kissing her lightly on the brow, “will marry a king and rule his castle, and your sons will be knights and princes and lords and, yes, perhaps even a High Septon.”

*He kissed her on the brow. “We’ll finish our talk on the morrow.”

ned was so affectionate with arya and im gonna cry because she needs a hug so bad

summary: Arya, to Sansa: These five people all need organ transplants or they will die. Lord Baelish is perfectly healthy. Sansa, do you...
body:
Arya, to Sansa: These five people all need organ transplants or they will die. Lord Baelish is perfectly healthy. Sansa, do you want to slice him open and use his organs to save the five sick people?

Littlefinger, panicking: Sansa, Sansa think about this. I’m your hottest fri-no, Margaery. I’m your nicest frien- no, brienne. I’m your friend!

summary: “That’s the real king of this castle right there,” one of the gold cloaks had told her. “Older than sin and twice as mean. One...
caption:
“That’s the real king of this castle right there,” one of the gold cloaks had told her. “Older than sin and twice as mean. One time the king was feasting the queen’s father, and that black bastard hopped up on the table and snatched a roast quail right out of Lord Tywin’s fingers. Robert laughed so hard he like to burst. You stay away from that one, child.”

Game of Thrones, Chapter 32

body:
JONRYA HALLOWEEN UPDATE

Hey everyone sorry it’s taken so long to get back to you all! I wanted to give as many people as possible time to see the original post. So it seems like many are down to do the 🧡 SPOOKY 🖤 SECRET 🧡 PUMPKIN 🖤 EXCHANGE 🧡!!! Yay!! I know last Christmas’ Secret Santa was a lot of fun so I’m sure you lovely, wonderful people will bring that same energy to this Halloween event for everyone’s favorite ASOIAF/GOT pairing (whether it’s romantic or familial)! The gift can range from fanfics to art to gif sets to music playlists or whatever your imagination can come up with.

The exchange will take place from OCTOBER 30TH (All Hallow’s Eve) to NOVEMBER 1ST (Dia de Los Muertos). It’s open to anyone who wishes to participate. The only “rules” are that the “gift” be centered around Jon Snow/Arya Stark and have a theme fitting for Halloween or the fall season.

Below is everyone who showed interest on the first post. I’m tagging you all to double check that you are wanting to participate. Please let me know by either leaving a comment on this post, reblogging for confirmation, a direct message to me. If you are not listed below you can still participate, just leave a confirmation.

The deadline to confirm participation is SEPTEMBER 30TH. You will be assigned an exchange partner no later than OCTOBER 2ND.

Now to make sure everyone hopefully gets something they like, you can create a wishlist of what you might like to receive (eg~ jonrya as kids, trick or treating, horror story, tim burton crossovers, etc… have fun with it). Of course, the wishlists aren’t requirements but a suggestion to help your Spooky Secret Pumpkin figure out what you like. There’s no set deadline for the wishlists, but try to have them submitted by OCTOBER 7TH so your S.S.P. has time to work on your gift. You can submit your wishlists under #SPOOKY SECRET PUMPKIN so they can be found easily.

When you submit your gift make sure to tag the recipient and use #JONRYA HALLOWEEN so everyone can find it.

I can’t wait to see what you all come up with!!

🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃🎃

@zanyyyyy @bubbah26 @xewioso @softboobage @circe1fanatic @smallvillemad @rizhiknay @lunamedellin @romasteveadrienette @kleindoeil @jennsilverwood @hufflepuffdisaster @maya-lev @bethgreenesgf @meseob @laboratorioautoral @gray-jedi-scavenger-rey @redrumkhaleesi @asprettyasyourown @buttercuparry

laura, 20s, germany.

summary: If Arya doesn’t get completely forgotten, she gets called a misogynist, murderer, psychopath and/or sociopath amongst other...
body:
If Arya doesn’t get completely forgotten, she gets called a misogynist, murderer, psychopath and/or sociopath amongst other things. Like what the fuck are you people watching? Arya cares deeply about her family and friends, it was shown several times. And it doesn’t end there: Remember the family she met with the Hound in 4.03? Lady Crane? I don’t think a “psychopath” would have given a single shit about them. Arya being nice to the Lannister soldiers? If she’s such a ruthless murderer driven by blind revenge, she would have killed them coldblooded, don’t you think? They’re on her enemies’ side after all. Gendry? Hot Pie? What about them? And Arya being a misogynist? Excuse me? She admires several heroines and even named her direwolf after one. She simply doesn’t fit into the role of a lady, which is difficult enough for her, especially in the world of Game of Thrones. Something she constantly gets mocked, even bullied, for. She doesn’t hate women, she simply hates being reduced to a role.
Arya Stark has flaws and she might be radical in some ways, but she is a wonderful, multifaceted character with lots of emotions, and not the coldblooded psychopath you want her to be. Leave her the fuck alone.

summary: That was the day without a dawn. Slowly the sky lightened around them, but they never saw the sun. Black turned to grey, and...
text: That was the day without a dawn. Slowly the sky lightened around them, but they never saw the sun. Black turned to grey, and colors crept timidly back into the world. The soldier pines were dressed in somber greens, the broadleafs in russets and faded golds already beginning to brown.
source: Arya Stark, A Storm of Swords
